description:
Enjoy that classic Blundstone style and comfort, with 1 big difference. Trading in their leather uppers for onMicro® Microfibre synthetic leather, you get a vegan version of a footwear icon.

  • onMicro Microfibre synthetic leather bonds a layer of hard-wearing polyurethane to a supple microfibre fabric, delivering the look and feel of full-grain leather
  • Uppers are seamlessly fused to the soles for resilient construction
  • onSteam® microfibre lining breathes well and wicks away moisture
  • Vegan verified removeable insoles offer great support and give you the option of using your own insoles for a perfect fit
  • Pull loops for extra leverage
  • Steel shank provides excellent torsional stability
  • Outsoles are slip-resistant rubber to keep you on course
  • These are sold in Australian sizes, which are different than Canadian/American sizes. Refer to the size chart to determine your correct size
name: Blundstone Original Vegan 2115 Boots - Unisex
